EmailTemplate.name: RE: New Year, New Home, New Client (1358529345.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: New Year, New Home, New Client (1358529345.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Mary, Great to hear from you again! I just reached out to Chris to get things moving. I have also set up your account for reenrollment. To activate please:. - Log in to the MBO site www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Click the “Enrollment” link once you are logged in - Confirm contact information - Print out I-9 at the end of the enrollment - You will sign/date section 1 and local notary will sign/date section 2 (most people visit their local bank.) Please email or fax back to MBO (we do not need an original copy.) If you use a US passport as supporting documentation I will need an image of it to comply with E-Verify (most people just take a picture with their phone and then email it to me.) - The link to my private page can be found here <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> there are lots of great resources on this page and I encourage you to bookmark it. Please contact me with any questions. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Ludwig Mary [mailto:mludwig@me.com] Sent: Friday, January 18, 2013 11:10 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: New Year, New Home, New Client Hello Sara, Well, my long sabbatical remodeling and moving is finally over and clients are calling. I want to put a new one with MBO and perhaps the old ones if things go smoothly. I would like whomever is the Biz Mgr for my account to contact Mr. Chris Bickell of Dynacore, (610) 844-4530, Cbickell@dynacore.com <mailto:Cbickell@dynacore.com>, to set them up on contract immediately if this is possible today. I contributed substantially while working with Chris on some huge efforts for his company Patriot Technologies that led to them being acquired by Harris Corp, so I am fairly sure Dynacore will be a good customer. My contract terms are $75 an hour for resume writing, editing, and general desktop work. The invoices are due within 15 calendar days. My new address is 4532 West Kennedy Blvd., Ste. 163, Tampa, FL, 33609 as of the 1st of the year. Please refresh my memory on your pay terms so I can minimize the transit time of my funds from your accounting processes to my bank account. Is there a way to time the client payment so that I get paid quickly? Thank you. V/r Mary Ludwig | Proposal Writer C: 703-628-3315 |
